Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OMI_API_GLOBAL omi::MapAttribute::MapAttribute ( bool  immutable = true)

Constructs a new empty MapAttribute.

Parameters
immutableWhether this attribute is immutable or not.
OMI_API_GLOBAL omi::MapAttribute::MapAttribute ( const Attribute &  other)

Constructs a new reference count of the given Attribute.

If the given attribute is not a valid map attribute this will construct a null attribute and the reference count will not be increased.

OMI_API_GLOBAL omi::MapAttribute::MapAttribute ( const MapAttribute &  other)

Constructs a new reference count of the given Attribute.

If the given attribute is invalid this will construct a null attribute and the reference count will not be increased.

const Attribute &  attrribute 
)

Inserts the given attribute into the map under the provided name.

Note
If an attribute already exists under the name, it will be overridden.
Exceptions
arc::ex::StateErrorIf this attribute is not valid.
arc::ex::IllegalActionErrorIf this attribute is immutable.
